title: Linux
description: I use Linux on a daily basis for work, but also for personal use. I know my way around the terminal and I can solve most Linux-related problems. Most of all, I enjoy using Linux for its simplicity, customization and the fact that it's open-source. I use Arch, by the way... ;)

title: NeoVim
description: I use NeoVim with Linux to get the best performance and speed while coding. I also have my custom config file loaded with extensions and custom bindings that make my text editor tasks seem trivial.
